verbs.description: Gov. Rick Scott [V: will] not recall Florida National Guard troops from the southern U.S. border in opposition to the Trump administration ’s “ zero tolerance ” crackdown on immigration that is splitting up families .

[ARG0: Gov. Rick Scott] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: recall] [ARG1: Florida National Guard troops] [ARGM-DIR: from the southern U.S. border] [ARGM-ADV: in opposition to the Trump administration ’s “ zero tolerance ” crackdown on immigration that is splitting up families] .

Gov. Rick Scott will not recall Florida National Guard troops from the southern U.S. border in opposition to the Trump administration ’s “ zero tolerance ” crackdown on immigration that [V: is] splitting up families .
